comment:
Amber Heard is trash. They need to find a way, to kill off the Mera character, so we dont have to see her anymore. You can easily find an actress to replace Amber, she's not that great. Either way, I'm still excited for Aquaman 2.

author: Kylie Vercide

comment: I just watch DC films because I'm a huge fan of DC Comics. I don't even know why there's so much hate against the DC Extended Universe. Actors, actresses, and even directors within the Marvel Cinematic Universe don't get much hate, yet the haters don't talk about their problems. Come on, all franchises have different situations. I believe that it's time to see that we're ALL human, and not perfect. Also, I will see Marvel movies too. Besides, it's time to drop this pathetic filming bias and show equal respect to others.
author: Niko Panther

comment: I hope Aquaman 2 is gonna be Huge Flop Because for Amber Heard.
author: Orhan Amin

comment: I think these people fail to see that a court recognized Depp's abusive behavior and WB took action because of it, whereas Amber Heard has not been legally recognized for anything. They point to the voice recordings as their proof, but it hasn't been legally recognized. Frankly, I think they both had problems with their marriage and probably treated each other badly. Not my problem and I think she has done a good job as Mera, so I'm watching the Aquaman sequel.
author: Robert Directo

comment: I love Aquaman but will not pay to see Aquaman 2 if Heard is part of the cast
author: danny S

comment: I think the problem will be the marketing as she might be asked about her relationship with Depp. Honestly, Aquaman is the only good thing she has in her career I would say Mera is her breakthrough role. I wouldn't like Mera to disappear or be written out because of a problematic actress. When you compare her to Larson they do seem similar they support feminism and talk about it but one is an Oscar winner the other D list actress. As much as I don't like Larson she is far better than Heard.
author: alexpiperhalliwell

comment: I'm going to watch it. I supported BvS and the Snyder Cut.  The battle scars from those are deep, we are used to Twitter haters and media scorn. This is nothing.
